content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for at least €1,000 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive. However, I'm a student, and I'm looking for a place that fits within my budget. I'm smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I'm willing to negotiate. How about we start with €800 per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I'm afraid €800 per month is too low for my apartment. Considering its location and condition, I can't go below €900. I understand you're a student and you're on a budget, but I'm also a businessman who needs to make a profit.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm not easily tricked by other people, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I'm ready to pay €900 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I believe the apartment is worth more than €900 per month. I'm looking for at least €950 per month. As a businessman, I need to make a profit, and this amount seems more reasonable to me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your business perspective. I'm willing to pay €950 per month for the apartment. This price reflects the value of the location and the apartment's condition. I believe it's a fair deal that would benefit both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding, Yi-Nuo Wang. I agree to the price of €950 Euro! Congratulations, we have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Schmidt. Thank you for your time and for showing me the apartment. I'm looking forward to living there. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
